abstract: Carl C. Icahn offered on Thursday to buy senior debt from creditors of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in return for their voting against a proposed deal with Spyglass Entertainment.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn offered on Thursday to buy senior debt from creditors of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in return for their voting against a proposed deal with Spyglass Entertainment.
lead_paragraph: 4:26 p.m. | Updated The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn offered on Thursday to buy senior debt from creditors of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in return for their voting against a proposed deal with Spyglass Entertainment.

headline.main: Bashing Spyglass Deal, Icahn Offers to Buy MGM Debt
